name: Bean Blitz
description:
Controls: WASD for Movement, Left Mouse Click for Attack

Welcome to Bean Blitz, a first person action game where you have to fight sentient beans that have taken over the forest. Will you regain control of the forest or will the beans continue on their quest to take over the world?

3rd Party Assets Used

LowPoly Environment Pack by k0rveen from Unity Asset Store

Customizable Skybox by Key Mouse from Unity Asset Store

Sword Swing, Score, Impact, Button, and Victory Sound Effects downloaded from sounds-resources.com

Evil Empire Font downloaded from fontget.com

Unity TextMeshPro & Navmesh

Made for SGDA Spring 23 Jam
